This week our fantastic team under the lead of Olaf Kolle and David Trejo set up our first eddy covariance flux tower at a disturbed marsh site near Lac Saint-Pierre. The site is now operational and real-time photos of the site can be accessed here:  <a href="https://phenocam.nau.edu/webcam/sites/lspdisturbedmarsh/">https://phenocam.nau.edu/webcam/sites/lspdisturbedmarsh/<a>
